thread.section_title: Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gorgeous Hotel, Great Staff
thread.title_full: Gorgeous Hotel, Great Staff - Review of Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Zaraselby
title: Gorgeous Hotel, Great Staff
text:
The whole hotel is like a series of jewel boxes. Our room was compact, well laid-out, and looked like it should be pictured in a book of elegant, old-school Parisian interiors. Ditto our kids' room. You didn't even feel like you were in a hotel -- more like you were in the guest room at the chateau of a fabulously wealthy, old-money family.
Staff were incredibly attentive and helpful. Before our visit they made a perfect restaurant recommendation for us (we don't really know the 16th) and reserved it for us as well.
Breathtakingly expensive, but a great treat for our lay-over night in Paris. The only downside -- which could be an upside for some -- is that it's on the far edge of the sleepy 16th arrondissement
